org.trimou.handlebars.i18n

Class AbstractTimeFormatHelper<F,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trimou.engine.config.AbstractConfigurationAware
      • org.trimou.handlebars.AbstractHelper
        • org.trimou.handlebars.BasicHelper
          • org.trimou.handlebars.BasicValueHelper
            • org.trimou.handlebars.i18n.LocaleAwareValueHelper
              • org.trimou.handlebars.i18n.AbstractTimeFormatHelper<F,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - The formattable object type
    S - The style type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationAware, Helper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateTimeFormatHelper, TimeFormatHelper

    public abstract class AbstractTimeFormatHelper<F,S>
extends LocaleAwareValueHelper
    An abstract time formatting helper.
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
